extendedInfo.description: Send messages into strips. Zebra skin in black - white stripes with an uneven line. Zebra has black stripes on a white background or white stripes on black? Yet no one was able to answer this question. Maybe you'll be the first to contemplate the theme every time I read a text message. Zebra is a gentle animal, even the seemingly dull, but can run at 60 km / h. He lives in Africa, south of the saccharide. Is a herbivorous animal skin, although in black - white stripes suggests more fierce climates. Zebra theme is also very often used by clothing designers. Black - white skirts, jackets, blouses beautifully blend dress with black elements. Also additions in black - white striped zebra as handbags, earrings, hair headbands add a distinct accent is too soft clothing. Key theme, black - white adds mystery. Imprint striped hooves introduces cheerful element.A timeless classic, at best, stylish edition! Elegant, black and white, awesome bars, this is it! Frame messages are in different shades of black, white and gray, and they are very clear. At the corners of each of them are adorable, sweet, tiny little hearts in white and black zebra stripes. Popup window is also maintained in the same stunning recital. Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  wallpaper present zebra theme in his classic black and white issue.- changed messages frames, in different black and white tones, easier to read. Letters are also black or white, depends on which color is back.- pop up window with the same charming, cute zebra skin stripesHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Zebra Theme for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Zebra Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button2. Choose Settings3. From settings tab select Advanced tab4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settingsSupport - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from âTHEMES ARCHITECTâFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other Â GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later
